    # Node.js dependencies
    node_modules/

    # Cypress-related generated files and directories
    cypress/videos/
    cypress/screenshots/
    cypress/reports/
    cypress/results/
    cypress/downloads/
    .nyc_output/
    coverage/

    # Environment variables
    .env
    .env.*

    # IDE and OS specific files
    .vscode/
    .DS_Store
    Thumbs.db
    npm-debug.log*
    yarn-debug.log*
    yarn-error.log*
